title: d3dx9_39.dll is missing from your computer
body: Once I get the game, before the loading screen am getting this issue "The Program can't start because d3dx9_39.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem." any solutions please.....

replies.body:
Those dll errors mean that the file was never installed properly, or somehow ended up corrupted or missing after the installation. Try the steps in this image first to start a repatch and that might be able to fix this up rather quickly.

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png

If that doesn't help, you should be able to fix that up by reinstalling, but make sure you do so as admin. Also, disable any firewalls while the install is going since some firewalls have been known to block certain files.
